metadata.title: Harrison Howard Hay Bale Storage Bag 1680D Oxford Fabric Large Capacity Tote Hay Bale Carry Bag for Horse Medium (45" L x 23" W x 19" H) Depp Navy
description: Reliably constructed from heavy-duty 1680 Denier water-repellent polyester, This bag will hold up well. The Harrison Howard EpiWrap Bale Storage Bag offers high-quality materials and an innovative design to keep your hay clean, dry, and protected from the elements while traveling. More importantly, it helps keep your vehicle clean! This storage bag is able to fit most bales of hay or straw, and maximize convenience for users, it greatly saves time and effort for fixing horse feeds, thus more time to enjoy with your horse or pony. Designed with extra-large capacity, two different sizes available - 52*29*22 inch and 45*23*19 inch. There is always room to spare in the bag. With four air vents equipped on the side to have decent air ventilation in and out of the bag, keep the inside hay bale or any other accessories fresh and covered. The water-repellent feature helps keep rain and melting snow from entering the bale and ground moisture from wicking up through the bottom. Our EpiWrap storage bags come with a three-sided wrap-around zip seal to stop hay spilling into the car or float, full-round carry straps with double-stitched fastening for durability, and padded handle on both sides for easy carrying. Simply fold away when not in use.
